name: 吳斯偉
objective: 本課程將給學生從較廣義的風險管理範疇對風險值有一番認識與瞭解，主要從風險值的觀點說明風險管理的相關議題，包括1) 決策法則，例如投資與避險法則。2) 信用風險。3)流動性、作業及法律風險。4)資本配置。5)企業風險管理。
schedule:
1-5週    : Market risk, Credit risk, Value at risk
6-8週    : Group discussions and presentations
9週      : 期中考
10-14 週 : Liquidity risk, Interest rate risk, Volatility,
Operational risk
15-17 週 : Group discussions and presentations
18週     : 期末考
scorePolicy:
Individual assignment   :25%
Individual presentation :25%
Group assignment        :25%
Group presentation      :25%

Pearson Education Inc. 雙葉書廊  ISBN: 978-0-13-800617-4
2. John C. Hull " Options, futures, and other derivatives" 2009,
Pearson Education Inc. 雙葉書廊  ISBN:978-0-13-500994-9

雙葉書廊  ISBN: 978-986-6672-57-6

Financial Risk" 2006  McGraw-Hill ISBN：0071464956
